column4: I have created a link on my desktop to run a program. when i click on it, it askes me if i want to run it. It will run but how do I bypass that dialog box and have the program run just by clicking?
is it asking to run as root?

no, it says 'programname' is an executable text file. and my options are 'run in terminal' , 'display','cancel', and 'run'. I click on run and it is fine but i want to not have to click on anything, I want it to just run.
